com.intel.inde.mp

Interface IVideoEffect


  • public interface IVideoEffect
    This simple interface should be used for implementation of video effects which could be embedded into MediaComposer pipeline

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void applyEffect(int inTextureId, long timeProgress, float[] transformMatrix)
      Main function of effect object.
      boolean fitToCurrentSurface(boolean should) 
      com.intel.inde.mp.domain.Pair<Long,Long> getSegment()
      It will be call be AMP pipeline manager to determinate the region of applying effect.
      void setInputResolution(com.intel.inde.mp.domain.Resolution resolution) 
      void setSegment(com.intel.inde.mp.domain.Pair<Long,Long> segment)
      Set the time region on target stream where effect will be applied.
      void start()
      Performs internal initialization.

    • Method Detail

      • getSegment

        com.intel.inde.mp.domain.Pair<Long,Long> getSegment()
        It will be call be AMP pipeline manager to determinate the region of applying effect.
        Returns:
        Segment of effect applying. Value (NULL, NULL) is valid and means whole stream time

      • setSegment

        void setSegment(com.intel.inde.mp.domain.Pair<Long,Long> segment)
        Set the time region on target stream where effect will be applied.
        Parameters:
        segment - is pair of time stamp in nanoseconds which is begin and end of effect.

      • start

        void start()
        Performs internal initialization. Creates required internal component and allocate buffers if necessary. Will be called from GL thread.

      • applyEffect

        void applyEffect(int inTextureId,
               long timeProgress,
               float[] transformMatrix)
        Main function of effect object. It will be called for each frame where effect required.
        Parameters:
        inTextureId - Input texture ID.
        timeProgress - Time of applying effect in target stream. In nanoseconds.
        transformMatrix - Transform matrix.

      • setInputResolution

        void setInputResolution(com.intel.inde.mp.domain.Resolution resolution)

      • fitToCurrentSurface

        boolean fitToCurrentSurface(boolean should)
        Parameters:
        should - default value in effect should be true
